text: Ne shikhwarumakhwo imbeli wuwo Omurumwa owahelesibwa eshitabu nohomba Omurumwa owulahelesibwa eshitabu, halali olwa asoma, shetani eretsanga obutswatswani mumasomo ako. Halali Nyasaye arusinjia akashetani aretsangamwo, mana Nyasaye atinyisinjia tsinyaali tsitsie , ne Nyasaye ni Owaamani owamachesi muno
